Merge #1600

1600: wasmer_instance_call: allow null params r=MarkMcCaskey a=yjh0502

allow null params if params_len is zero

# Description
wasmer_export_func_call allows null params when params_len is zero, but wasmer_instance_call is not. The PR makes wasmer_instance_call to accept null params too.

# Review

- [ ] Add a short description of the the change to the CHANGELOG.md file

commit.message:
Merge #1590

1590: Fix soundness issue in vm::Global r=MarkMcCaskey a=MarkMcCaskey

The `unsafe impl` for `Send` and `Sync` relies on the global being
locked when it's being accessed; the get and get_mut functions did
not (and could not) do this, so we replace them with `get` and `set`
methods which operate on `Value`s directly.

Additionally the `get_mut` function took a `&self` and returned a
`&mut` to the underlying data which allows for aliased mutable
references to the same data which is another soundness issue.

# Review

- [x] Add a short description of the the change to the CHANGELOG.md file


Co-authored-by: Mark McCaskey <mark@wasmer.io>

verification.payload:
tree 4b317524507ad6f6b22369f01df2f93bb52ae206
parent faf93d91efd7c9d9bf6a77a2c3f9de4f6d7ef634
parent c2a10c404612fd0ef5c968d679f1f48f19e9820d
author bors[bot] <26634292+bors[bot]@users.noreply.github.com> 1599177294 +0000
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1599177294 +0000

Merge #1590

1590: Fix soundness issue in vm::Global r=MarkMcCaskey a=MarkMcCaskey

The `unsafe impl` for `Send` and `Sync` relies on the global being
locked when it's being accessed; the get and get_mut functions did
not (and could not) do this, so we replace them with `get` and `set`
methods which operate on `Value`s directly.

Additionally the `get_mut` function took a `&self` and returned a
`&mut` to the underlying data which allows for aliased mutable
references to the same data which is another soundness issue.

# Review

- [x] Add a short description of the the change to the CHANGELOG.md file


Co-authored-by: Mark McCaskey <mark@wasmer.io>

commit.message: Remove redundant checks form api::Global::set
Add updates from feedback
Update changelog

Fix soundness issue in vm::Global

The `unsafe impl` for `Send` and `Sync` relies on the global being
locked when it's being accessed; the get and get_mut functions did
not (and could not) do this, so we replace them with `get` and `set`
methods which operate on `Value`s directly.

Additionally the `get_mut` function took a `&self` and returned a
`&mut` to the underlying data which allows for aliased mutable
references to the same data which is another soundness issue.
